name: jsonviewer-webpack
description: SPA JSON Viewer on Ext JS 6.2 using Webpack

scripts.sencha:generate-app: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/code -w /code jsonviewer-webpack sencha -sdk /opt/ext generate app -ext -classic JsonViewer /code
scripts.sencha:build: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/code -w /code jsonviewer-webpack sencha app build
scripts.sencha:watch: docker run --rm -p 1841:1841 -v ${PWD}:/code -w /code jsonviewer-webpack sencha app watch
